title: Check out our 3 bed / 2 bath. Every convenience your heart desires!
posting_body: ['Walden Brook - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 3 / Bath: 2', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 1425 - 1532 sq ft', 'Rent: $2022/Month', 'Terms: 6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', "The living spaces at Gardenwood Apartments are thoughtfully designed for comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other rental apartments in College Park.", 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '✓ Carpet', '✓ Ceiling Fans', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Disposal', '✓ Extra Storage', '✓ Office', '✓ Oven', '✓ Pantry', '✓ Patio or Balcony', '✓ Sprinkler System', '✓ Built in computer niches', "✓ Children's activity center", '✓ Contemporary floor plans', '✓ Crown Molding', '✓ Fully equipped modern kitchens', '✓ Hardwood Floors', '✓ Large walk-in closets', '✓ Recreation Room', '✓ Spacious 1, 2 & 3 Bedrooms', '✓ Upgrade Unit', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '✓ Business Center', '✓ Clubhouse', '✓ Courtyard', '✓ Fitness Center', '✓ Gameroom', '✓ Gated entry', '✓ Laundry Facility', '✓ Maintenance on site', '✓ Multi Use Room', '✓ Resort Style Swimming Pool', 'w/Cabana', '✓ Car Care Center', '✓ Controlled Access', '✓ Detached garages', '✓ Lake view', '✓ Online Services', '✓ Package Service', '✓ Planned Social Activities', '✓ Property Manager on Site', '✓ Public Transportation', '✓ Sundeck', 'Contact Info:', 'show contact info', '100 Walden Brook Drive', 'Lithonia, GA 30038', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '2FF46CF1E7DD47']
